overview: Guys have been asking for a film that celebrates the pure joy of toking up before, during and after wild butt-sex. Well, here you go: an epic paean to the Dionysian bliss of pot, poppers and ass-pummeling. Just settle back, light up a bowl, get righteously blotto and start slow-strokin' that dick of yours. Being a man in the modern world can be tough. You deserve to kick back and oblivionate for a coupla hours. Join the party, mate!
title: Stoned & Boned
